price: Na sε wͻ’gyae (mo haw) a, nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, na Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
